content.desc: An item including the Slot tag.

content.TransferCooldown: Int Time until next transfer in ticks.
content.Enabled: Byte Whether or not the minecart hopper will pick up items.
content.LootTable: String Loot table used to fill the hopper minecart when it is next opened.
content.LootTableSeed: Long Seed for generating the loot table.
